Traditional cuisine in Southwestern France includes duck, goose, fish and various seafood dishes. In the area around Bordeaux, lamb, Bordelaise sauce, oysters and other fish dishes are traditional fare, as well as superb local wines. The egg-based patisserie
is a traditional dessert in the region around Bordeaux. The Toulouse region is known for its cuisine based around specially fattened duck, or
raised in the rural regions of Gers and Landes, west of Toulouse. Traditional dishes include :
